example.name: Metaphorical tincture
example.text: In addition, it revealed that the "Persian-national" spirit that-1 *T*-1 tinctures Iran's foreign policy and its various positions, far from the claims of enmity to America and Israel, are only used to serve Iran's interests.
example.arg: Iran's foreign policy and its various positions

predicate.note: Frames file for 'tincture' based on instances in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison to 'tinge.'
